comments.author: MatF
comments.content:
:-) Randy, you always amaze me!
I would like to have as much bollocks as you.
I am sure you did the good choice. There are a huge amount of money to make for such talented programmer as you, and you should do it for yourself on something you like instead of for somebody else.
Enjoy your time with Kamil and say "Hi" to him from me.

I am coming to London in two weeks, but I have no time to meet you two :-( Just one busy day of work...
Good luck in your new life!
